name: 社群媒體概論
goals: Learn the role of social media in politics, privacy and security, education, disaster communication, advertising, Internet addiction, and other practical aspects, and apply it in the context of social education
Study social media research from the perspectives of traditional interpersonal communication theory, mass communication theory, and psychology, and apply it in the context of social education
syllabus:
**【Teaching method: 16+2 weeks】**

Week 1 (2/17): Course introduction, introduction to social media

Week 2 (2/24): Principles of social media

Week 3 (3/3): Social media and traditional interpersonal communication theory

Week 4 (3/10): Social media and Mass Communication Theory

Week 5 (3/17): Social media psychology

Week 6 (3/24): Social media application

Week 7 (3/31): Social media and politics

Week 8 (4/7): Mid-term assessment

Week 9 (4/14): Social media privacy and security

Week 10 (4/21): Social media and education

Week 11 (4/28): Social media and disaster communication

Week 12 (5/5): Social media and advertising

Week 13 (5/12): Social media addiction

Week 14 (5/19): A brief history of social media

Week 15 (5/26): Future development and prospects of social media

Week 16 (6/2): Final assessment

Week 17 (6/9): Self-learning week

Week 18 (6/16): Self-learning week
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
